name: EmbedScript
description: A reusable component for embedding external scripts and widgets like job boards, calendars, forms, etc.

id.description: Unique identifier for the embed container

scriptSrc.description: The script source URL to load

mountId.description: The container ID where the script should mount its content

scriptAttributes.description: Additional script attributes as key-value pairs (e.g., data-mount-in)

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the section container

titleContainerClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the title container

titleClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the title

subtitleClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the subtitle

embedContainerClassName.description: Additional CSS classes for the embed container div

examples.name: Join.com Job Widget
examples.description: Embed a Join.com job board widget
